channel.title: Some One use 10 mins of his time and help me with my server!SERIOUSE PROBLEMS 7+
channel.description:
Ok guys... i know some info about servers, but u cant call me a pro XD , so i got some SERIOUS problems... my server is DELTA base, thats what ive been told
#1- An attack option appears on players while putting mouse on them,its needed in pk only .how to remove?!
#2- I noticed on some servers, if u die in wilderness (PK) while skulled and having a firecape, u keep it so that there is NO WAY that you can lose it, how can i do that?
#3- I also noticed on servers that if u die from NPC's you don't lose stuff ur having, u only do if u die pking, how can i do that as well? cuz that really pissing me off!
#4- How Can i add the ::vote command in which is automatically opens a window for my voting site...
#5- how can i add chat effects like green: blue: wave: scroll: ... etc
#6how can i fix my pk points? , i got the pkp system and pkp shop, but when anyone gets pkp and logs out, it dosnt save, so he'll have 0 pkp again, anyway i can fix that?
#7- How can i add TOP 10 hiscores in-game? *not really necessary, other problems r badly need *
#8- in wilderness, if u need to atk a player on a certain wildy lvl, when other runs of that lvl, they keep atking untill lvl 1, how to stop that?
#9- How can i add dragon claws special to the game.. i tried finding many TUTs , and i found like 7 of em, none of em worked, maybe i cant understand the steps or something... so i need the spec and the adding of weapon.. ANY IDEAS?
THATS all of my PROBLEMS... PLEASE IF U KNOW ANY, post the link , as the code is long to be posted, so i only need the link and if there is anything in it just post it near the link.. and also, if there was a thig thats hard to explain.. PLEASE! send me and chat with me on my mail, adoom1221@yahoo.com ... ill be paying RS GP for the guy who helps me with aLL of my PROBLEMS! i got 32M cash and some shit.. and im ready to PAY THEM ALL as i quitted! but if ur too generous, u can doo it for free ^.^
THANKS IN ADVANCE!! ILL BE THNKFUL TO YOU UNTIL I DIE! please help me out guys.. once again, PLEASE!

Read full topic
